title: why is teemo disabled
body: i just wanna know why teemo is disabled hes my main hes og and hes amazing. please tell meh and if hes ever comin back

replies.body: please someone tell meh im dying w/out teemo in mah life!!!

Teemo is currently disabled due to an issue with his passive.  A solution is being worked on, and in the meantime updates are being made on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page so be sure to bookmark it.  Hang tight until then!
How long is this fix going to tale
so hes not getting a nerf or a buff?
Nope, just a bug fix on his passive. Teemo was able to auto-attack in bushes without disrupting his stealth activation. He isn't suppose to go invisible if he is in combat.
How long is it going to take

oh okay!
any notice on when hes coming back?
